---
title: "Articles"
categories: [listing, card]
listing:
    id: articles-card-listing
    contents:
        # Only explicitly include directories we want (whitelist approach)
        - "../javase/*.qmd"
        - "../linux/*.qmd"
        - "../markup/*.qmd"
        - "../vocabulary/*.qmd"
        - "../scrum/*.qmd"
        - "../spring/*.qmd"
        - "../springboot*.qmd"
        - "../devops/*.qmd"
        - "../reactjs/*.qmd"
        - "../about/*.qmd"
        # Exclude any problematic files that might still get through
        - "!../*/_*.qmd"
        - "!../markup/_content.qmd"
    sort:
        - "file-modified desc"
        - "categories"
    type: default
    sort-ui: [title, categories]
    filter-ui: [title]
    image-align: left
    fields: [image, categories, title, description, reading-time, date, author, file-modified]
    date-format: full
    categories: cloud
    image-height: 160px
---
